{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Acelink |model=BR-6774 |revision=AC |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C2600 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=MU-MIMO |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 4T4R Concurrent Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.acelink.com.tw/BR-6774AC.html Product page] ===Features=== * Comply 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards with 4T4R in both 5GHz and 2.4GHz. * Supports 2.4GHz and 5GHZ wireless networks connection simultaneously. * Support 4T4R MIMO technology in 5GHz frequency and 4T4R MIMO technology :in 2.4GHz frequency, enhancing the performance and coverage range significantly. * Support 64/128-bit WEP, WPA and WPA2 securities and also 802.1x authentication. * High speed transmit and receive data rate - 1733Mbps while operating in 802.11ac :(5GHz, 80MHz) mode and 800Mbps while operating in 802.11an (2.4/5GHz) mode. * Supports WPS function for easy wireless association. * Supports USB3.0 and USB2.0 ports. ===Specifications=== *Product: 4T4R Concurrent Dual Band Gigabit Router *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz Dual Core Internet Processor *WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 (2.4GHz) + QCA9980 (5GHz) *MIMO Technology: 5GHz: 4T4R MIMO, 2.4GHz: 4T4R MIMO *Antenna: 4x 3dBi Dual Band external dipole antenna *Flash: 128MB NAND Flash *RAM: 256MB (2x) DDR3 SDRAM *Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 Gigabit Switch *Port: USB: 1x USB2.0, 1x USB3.0 :WAN: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port :LAN: 4x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port *Power: 12V, 3A Switch Power Adapter *Dimension: 142mm x 235mm x 38mm (HxWxD) (enclosure only) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32871-tp-link-archer-c2600-ac-2600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C2600 AC2600 Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 32 MB (SPI, SOIC 16-pin) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE) ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ac Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Acelink BR-6774AD]] *[[Netgear R7800]] ==Images== __NOTOC__
